interpretation:
The First Quarter Moon emoji depicts a partially lit moon, with half of it in shadow and half of it illuminated. This card often represents a time of growth and progress, where things are beginning to take shape and move forward. It can signify a period of action and decision-making, where you may need to make choices and take risks in order to move forward towards your goals. 

Keywords associated with this card might include momentum, progress, decision-making, action, growth, and change. The First Quarter Moon encourages us to embrace change and take the necessary steps to move forward, even if it feels uncomfortable or uncertain. It reminds us that we are capable of making progress and achieving our goals, as long as we have the courage to take action and keep moving forward.
